document.full_text: the committee that runs the orange bowl bumped up its ceo's pay by nearly $150,000 in 2009, boosting his compensation to more than $500,000, according to a recently filed tax return.
document.title: orange bowl ceo got hefty pay bump
lines_and_colors: the committee that runs the orange bowl bumped up its ceo's pay by nearly $150,000 in 2009, boosting his compensation to more than $500,000, according to a recently filed tax return.
